contentrichtext.text: '''James Tuchet, 6th Earl of Castlehaven''' (died 12 October 1740) was the son of [[James Tuchet, 5th Earl of Castlehaven]] and his wife Anne Pelson.<ref>Cockayne, G.E. ''Complete Peerage'' 2000 Reprint Vol.3 p.88</ref> He succeeded his father as [[Earl of Castlehaven]] and [[Baron Arundel]] on 9 August 1700. He married, on 14 May 1722, Elizabeth Arundell (1693–1743), daughter of Henry Arundell, 5th [[Baron Arundell of Wardour]]<ref>Cockayne p.88</ref> and his wife, nÃ©e Elizabeth Panton. They had two sons, and at least one daughter: * [[James Tuchet, 7th Earl of Castlehaven]] (1723–1769) * [[John Tuchet, 8th Earl of Castlehaven]] (1724–1777) * Lady Elizabeth Tuchet<ref>Cockayne p.89</ref> He is buried at [[Saint-Sulpice (Paris)|St. Sulpice]] in [[Paris]], [[France]]. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Rayment|date=February 2012}} {{S-start}} {{S-reg|ie}} {{Succession box | before=[[James Tuchet, 5th Earl of Castlehaven|James Tuchet]] | title=[[Earl of Castlehaven]] | years=1700–1740 | after=[[James Tuchet, 7th Earl of Castlehaven|James Tuchet]]}} {{S-end}} {{Use dmy dates|date=January 2012}} {{Persondata | name = Castlehaven | alternative names = | short description = | date of birth = | place of birth = | date of death = 12 October 1740 | place of death = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Castlehaven}} [[Category:1740 deaths|Castlehaven, James Tuchet, 6th Earl of]] [[Category:Earls in the Peerage of Ireland]] [[Category:Earls of Castlehaven|*06]] [[Category:Barons Audley|*16]] [[Category:Year of birth unknown]]
